body: Here you go: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/bSwfCDfF4Fa9yun-ai1tAq8UV9w4iTXC8z7K*UQkxMIwMxOoctlMfLSMNmVvvnCkmy3HX-gSSWD4znABPBvdiThrBI4h3VUs/contextGeometry.png) Haven't tested it for enough cases so make sure to double check the outputs.
